name: ibm-randori
label: IBM Randori
description: IBM Randori is an attack surface management SaaS that monitors internal and external attack surfaces for unexpected changes, blind spots, misconfigurations, and process failures. This connector facilitates automated operations to fetch network, target, service etc.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Service based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Service based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.description: API token configured for your account for using the IBM Randori API.
fields.tooltip: API token configured for your account for using the IBM Randori API.
fields.name: api_token

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get IP Objects
operations.description: Retrieves IP objects based on the query, limit, offset parameter you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: q

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of records to return. Default: 50 Min: 1 Max: 2000
parameters.description: Maximum number of records that this operation should return. Values supported are: Default: 50 Min: 1 Max: 2000

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: The offset of the first item to return. Default: 0 Min: 0
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. By default, this is set as 0 and the minimum supported value is 0.
